name: Last Patrol
defeated: We failed our mission, maybe, you can do better...
introduction: Good afternoon fellow survivor, please report any organized criminal movements so we can deal with it.
hateHello: We got reports of your misdeeds, stop now or there will be consequences.
tradeRequest: We need finances, and maybe you need this.
uniques: Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [-10]% more Influence
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [10]

name: MalGen
startIntroPart1: Welcome to Malcolm Genetics, here you will be helping to bring back creatures gone extinct due to nuclear hellfire, human intervention, or other means. You may be wodering why we still exist, the answer being.....
startIntroPart2: Ha! You thought you were going  to get an answer, get back to work.
declaringWar: Unfortunately you stand in the way of progress.
attacked: Why do you hate progress so much?
defeated: Of course, as the Old World did so did the New World.
introduction: Welcome to Malcolm Genetics where creativity and innovation are our heart and soul.
tradeRequest: We need this for research purposes, would you be interested?

name: Solar Empire
declaringWar: You will die for rejecting the sun!
attacked: I will KILL you... and I think, no, I know, I'll enjoy you screams. 'Laughs Maniacaly'
defeated: NOOooo! My sun, my beautiful sun, It's ruined! Oh, and my people are endangered...
introduction: Bow before the almighty Daybreaker, most powerful alicorn of all time.
neutralHello: Bow before me! Then we can talk.
tradeRequest: The almighty Daybreaker in all her power, and beauty would like to trade!
uniques: [-1 Happiness] [in all cities] <when not at war>
Comment [Resting point for Influence with City-States is decreased by 15]
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [-15] <hidden from users>

name: The Tortured Ones
startIntroPart1:
THERE IS NO HOPE. THE PATH OF PROGRESS IS A TORTURED PATH.

THE TORTURED PATH ONLY BRINGS DECEPTION, SUFFERING, AND DEATH.

WE WERE PROMISED A QUICK WAR, THE WAR DESOLATED THE WORLD.

WHAT DID THEY DO TO US?

WHY MUST WE SUFFER, WHILE THEY STUDY US?

THERE IS NO HOPE. THERE IS NO HOPE. THERE IS NO HOPE.

declaringWar: THE DESTRUCTION OF YOU IS A NECESSARY MOVE.
introduction: I WELCOME YOU FELLOW HUMAN. I AM THE REPRESENTATIVE, SPEAKER FOR OUR LEADER, THE MECHANIST. PLEASE, DON'T BE ALARMED BY OUR LOOKS
